snippet: Mr. Duncan and the Penguins never replicated the success they enjoyed with “Earth Angel,” which sold more than 10 million copies.
abstract: Cleve Duncan, lead singer of 1950s doo-wop group the Penguins, dies at age 78.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Duncan and the Penguins never replicated the success they enjoyed with “Earth Angel,” which sold more than 10 million copies.

headline.seo: Cleve Duncan, 1954 Hitmaker With ‘Earth Angel,’ Dies
headline.main: Cleve Duncan, the Voice of ‘Earth Angel’, Dies
headline.print_headline: Cleve Duncan, the Voice of ‘Earth Angel’
